title: Kubernetes Ingress Rule
description: Kubernetes ingress rule exposing a single path.

host.title: HTTP Hostname
host.description: The hostname which this application should be accessable on, such as www.example.com. You must own this domain and have it associated with this kubernetes cluster if you would like automatic DNS record and SSL certificate management. Learn about DNS configuration [here](https://docs.massdriver.cloud/platform/dns-zones).

message.pattern: Hostname should consist of letters, numbers, periods and hyphens, such as www.example.com

path.title: HTTP Path
path.description: The HTTP path which, when appended to the host above, this application will serve traffic on

message.pattern: Must begin with a '/' and be a valid HTTP endpoint
